meanings.definition: A type of self-service restaurant where food and drinks are dispensed from vending machines.
meanings.sent1: At the automats, you can get a sandwich or a soda easily.
meanings.sent2: My favorite place to eat is the automats down the street.
meanings.sent3: I went to the automats and accidentally got two sodas instead of one!
meanings.sent4: The automats are like magical food dispensers, like something out of a sci-fi movie.
meanings.sent5: The automats hum with activity as people select their meals with a press of a button.

meanings.definition: A machine that automatically performs a specific task, especially one controlled by a coin-operated mechanism.
meanings.sent1: The automat in the parking lot dispenses tickets for the car wash.
meanings.sent2: I always keep spare change for the automat at the laundromat.
meanings.sent3: The automat at the arcade gave me extra tokens by mistake!
meanings.sent4: The vending machine is like an automat that gives out snacks instead of meals.
meanings.sent5: The automat whirred to life, completing its task with precision and speed.
